body:
`spack checksum` should (optionally) try to download file from mirror(s) if the original URL doesn't work

### Rationale

That's what mirrors are for, right? To be used as a fallback if the original URL doesn't work anymore.

### General information

- [ ] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Use mirrors for 'spack checksum'
